channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Visual Studio 2019
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Visual Studio 2019

item.title: CVE-2020-0789|2024-08-04T06:11:05.677Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio%202019
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists when the Visual Studio Extension Installer Service improperly handles hard links, aka 'Visual Studio Extension Installer Service Denial of Service Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2020-1257|2024-08-04T06:31:59.965Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio%202019
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the Diagnostics Hub Standard Collector Service improperly handles file operations, aka 'Diagnostics Hub Standard Collector Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-1278, CVE-2020-1293.
